outputs.output_descr:
1.1. Review/Critique of 2008-2010 Basra Provincial Development Strategy 
1.2. Strengthened center-province coordination on strategic planning and budget execution 
1.3. Clarified roles and responsibilities in Provincial Budget Execution Cycle
1.4. Finalized 2010-2013 Basra PDS 
2.1. Completed Functional Analysis in Basra Governor's Office 
2.2. Upgraded operations and information management systems in Governor's Office
2.3. Established Planning Units in Mayor's Offices (6 Districts) 
2.4. Conducted Poverty Mapping for monitoring and evaluation of development strategies
3.1. Local communities mobilized and trained in project planning and implementation 
3.2 Upgraded operations and information management systems in Governor's Office 
3.3 Established Planning Units in Mayor's offices (6 Districts)

project_title: budget execution support project  basra province
